room_title: Escape room "WizardQuest" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We had so much fun! The Wizard themed room was beautiful and very clever.

room_title: Escape room "WizardQuest" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Great puzzles, wonderful use of props to create ambiance, engaging story, all the proper elements are there and executed to perfection. The Wizard Escape Room was the most memorable room I've taken part in to date.

room_title: Escape room "WizardQuest" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Lots of fun! The Wizard Room was challenging, but we escaped in 47:12. The staff and our Game Master Molly was also very friendly and helpful!

room_title: Escape room "WizardQuest" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: I was able to have the great opportunity to test out the Wizard room tonight, and everything about my experience was wonderful. The rooms were nicely decorated and interactive, the puzzles were clever, and having the pieces fall into place over time was very satisfying. This was my first escape experience, and it could not have been any more fun or pleasant. I cannot wait to try another some time. Thank you so much!
